movie.title: Shawshank Redemption
movie.synopsis: Andy Dufresne, a successful banker, is arrested for the murders of his wife and her lover, and is sentenced to life imprisonment at the Shawshank prison. He becomes the most unconventional prisoner.

movie.title: Inception
movie.synopsis: Cobb steals information from his targets by entering their dreams. Saito offers to wipe clean Cobb's criminal history as payment for performing an inception on his sick competitor's son.

movie.title: Titanic
movie.synopsis: Seventeen-year-old Rose hails from an aristocratic family and is set to be married. When she boards the Titanic, she meets Jack Dawson, an artist, and falls in love with him.

movie.title: The Revenant
movie.synopsis: Hugh Glass, a legendary frontiersman, is severely injured in a bear attack and is abandoned by his hunting crew. He uses his skills to survive and take revenge on his companion who betrayed him.

movie.title: White House Down
movie.synopsis: A Capitol policeman leaps into action to save his daughter and protect the American president from a group of terrorists who have seized the White House.

movie.title: Django Unchained
movie.synopsis: When Django, a slave, is freed, he joins forces with a bounty hunter to rescue his wife, who has been enslaved by Calvin, a hard-hearted plantation owner.

movie.title: 21 Jump Street
movie.synopsis: Schmidt and Jenko are high school friends who go on to become police officers. The two friends go undercover as students in order to bust a drug ring and find the source of a synthetic drug.

review.content: Oh my god this movie is so funny I can't stop laughing my arse off.
Channing Tatum is so hot and so silly at the same time lmao.
